intro: Randia lichiangensis, commonly known as the Yunnan randia, is a species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and produces small, clustered white flowers. It is typically found in moist, shaded environments in mountainous regions. Randia lichiangensis is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and potential ecological significance.
